column1: You liberate me from my own noise and my own chaos
column2: 你让我得解救，脱离自身的噪音与自我的混乱
column4: From the chains of a lesser law You set me free
column5: 你使我得自由，冲破紧裹的界限与束缚的枷锁
column7: You liberate me from my own noise and my own chaos

column13: In the silence of the heart You speak

column19: and it is there that I will know You
